listeningQuestion.question: Who were the three men in the balloon?

editorNotes: 这篇文章讲述了一个有趣的误会事件，发生在皇家空军基地。文章通过描述一个气球的意外出现和后续的调查过程，展现了一个幽默的误会。语法重点包括现在进行时、被动语态和定语从句的使用。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: A pilot noticed a balloon which seemed to be making for a Royal Air Force Station nearby.
He informed the station at once, but no one there was able to explain the mystery.
The officer in the control tower was very angry when he heard the news, because balloons can be a great danger to aircraft.
He said that someone might be spying on the station and the pilot was ordered to keep track of the strange object.
The pilot managed to circle the balloon for some time.
He could make out three men in a basket under it and one of them was holding a pair of binoculars.
When the balloon was over the station, the pilot saw one of the men taking photographs.
Soon afterwards, the balloon began to descend and it landed near an airfield.
The police were called in, but they could not arrest anyone, for the basket contained two Members of Parliament and the Commanding Officer of the station!
As the Commanding Officer explained later, one half of the station did not know what the other half was doing!

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 一个飞行员发现了一只气球，它像是正飞往附近的一个皇家空军基地。
他马上把情况报告了该基地，但那里的人没有一个能解释这到底是怎么回事。
控制塔上的官员得知这一消息后，非常气愤，因为气球有可能给飞机造成极大的危险。
他说可能有人正对基地进行侦察，因此命令那个飞行员跟踪那个奇怪的飞行物。
飞行员设法绕着气球飞了一阵。
他看清了气球下面有3个人呆在一只筐里，其中一个举着望远镜。
当气球飞临基地上空时，飞行员看见有一个人在拍照。
不久，气球开始降落，在一个停机坪附近着了陆。
警察被召来了，但他们却不能逮捕任何人，因为筐里是两名国会议员和一名基地的指挥官！
正如指挥官后来解释的那样，基地的这半边不知道那半边正在干什么！

notes.title: 现在进行时
content: seemed to be making for (似乎正在飞向)
might be spying on (可能正在侦察)

notes.title: 定语从句
content: a balloon which seemed to be making for
the officer in the control tower who was very angry

notes.example: seemed to be making for a Royal Air Force Station
was ordered to keep track of the strange object

multipleChoice.question: Why was the officer in the control tower angry?
options: Because the balloon was flying too high
Because balloons can be dangerous to aircraft
Because the pilot didn't report immediately
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中提到气球可能给飞机造成极大的危险，这就是控制塔官员生气的原因。

fillInBlanks.sentence: The pilot ___ to circle the balloon for some time and ___ out three men in a basket.
fillInBlanks.hint: 使用manage to do和make out的适当形式

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 这篇文章反映了军事基地的安全 protocols 和 communication 问题。即使在高度机密的军事设施中，不同部门之间也可能存在信息沟通不畅的情况。这种情况在大型组织中并不罕见。
